title: 翻墙 | GranGorz更新至Beta版V6.3
content:
GranGorz is a free software to protect the user privacy online by providing anonymity to the user.

GranGorz empowers journalist and activists to bypass the internet censorship and browse the internet freely. Internet filtering and tracking internet users has been a policy actively pursued by the repressive regimes to restrict the flow of news and information in and out of the country. This application is aimed at breaking the censorship.

下载

  • VERSION:Beta v6.3 (r2753) 
  • RELEASE DATE05/03/2014
  • MD5 CHECKSUM:f933da021d0074aa0fe01566790c5043 
Please visit our Facebook page to download the latest version.

What operating systems does GranGorz support?

GranGorz is fully tested and compatible with all the latest Windows OSs both 32-bit and 64-bit:

Minimum Requirements:

Windows 8
Windows 7
Windows Vista
Windows XP
Microsoft .NET 4.0 must be installed.

浏览器代理设置：

socks5：127.0.0.1：9999
HTTP 127.0.0.1:8181
HTTPS 127.0.0.1:8181
